title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/About/Leadership/PLP-490.png
description: Leadership Programs at Curry college: The President’s Leadership Program (PLP) at Curry College is made up of a highly selective group of talented, driven, compassionate, and accomplished students and is designed to inspire and foster leaders of tomorrow. The President’s Leadership Program prepares students for a life of leadership, civic responsibility, and career success through a range of activities, workshops, and events just for PLP students both inside and outside the classroom.

description: Meal Plan Accommodations at Curry College: Curry College takes your dietary needs seriously and we understand that your health and safety are most important to a successful college experience.

title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/Student-Life/Disability-Services/dres-720.png
description: Housing Accommodations at Curry College: Accessible Housing is available to students at Curry who have disabilities that substantially impact one or more major life activities as they relate to housing.

title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/Student-Life/Disability-Services/danimal-720.png
description: Emotional Support Animals (ESA) at Curry College: All Emotional Support Animal Documentation must come from an external, licensed provider who oversees the treatment of your diagnosed disability and has an established relationship with you.

title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/Student-Life/Disability-Services/dabroad-720.png
description: Disability Accommodations Abroad at Curry College: The underlying philosophy of Curry College is still to support our students with disabilities as much as possible with their needs as if it did apply abroad.

description: Curry College Bookstore: Our selection of textbooks, general books, computers, course materials, and supplies will ensure every Curry College student is prepared for success.

title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/About/safety-1440-sm.jpg
description: Safety at Curry College: The Curry College Department of Public Safety's mission is to provide a safe and secure environment for our entire community.
